entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 in the Postville area. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 18 in the Postville area. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
